item.title: Manning court ground floor lights not working, 31st December
item.description:
Please could the lights located on the ground floor of Manning court be fixed as soon as possible as they are currently not working therefore the ground floor lobby area is in darkness. The address is.. Manning court Ground floor lobby Titmus avenue thamesmead London se28 Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Titmuss Avenue, Thamesmead, Greater London
